about_the_game:
Fusion Fighters is a fighting game unlike any other! In Fusion Fighters, instead of picking from a roster of characters and learning how to play some, you create your own characters by creating various equipment like weapons and apparel. You can create a build to suit any playstyle!



Features:
  • Highly customizable character creation system
  • Singleplayer and multiplayer PvP and PvE gamemodes
  • Rollback NetCode online support
  • Up to 4 players can play at once
  • Custom stage builder
  • Ability to share custom creations with players online
  • Free updates for 2 years
  • And much, much more!




In Fusion Fighters, the start of every good build is making good equipment! You can create custom weapons, subs, and apparel by using various templates and modifiers to make unique equipment! There's nearly 1,000 unique combinations for just the weapons alone!



You can view your equipment collections at any time. If you decide you don't need one anymore, you can scrap it to get back the materials used to create it. You won't get the money back, but you can get everything else back.




Once you've made your equipment, put it together in a build! Builds are user-created sets that are saved locally and can be used online. Builds contain a primary weapon, a secondary weapon, a sub, an Ultimate, a badge, your outfit, and cosmetic options.



The build creation menu allows you to create a build while testing it out. The menu is designed to make iterating on your builds as simple as possible, and also doubles as the game's training room.




Before you battle, feel free to choose from an existing ruleset or create your own! There are enough settings to completely change the experience. Whether you want to change the win condition, starting items, or stock count, it's got you covered.



There's also a gamemode called World Cup, which is a PvE mode where you unlock new templates and enhancers for your equipment! Each match consists of a ruleset, a stage, and some opponents. There are many presets for each of these, and each one is also slightly variated when you play, so no two runs are the same!

short_description: Fusion Fighters is a sci-fi fighting game where players create robot fighters using an in-game character builder. Customize your weapons, passive abilities, appearance, and more to become the fusion fighter champion!
